casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. George Rios (8167)

Spall one, Lavery and Cretella, Js.

Argued April 30 decision released May 2, 1990 Dennis F. O’Toole, assistant public defender, for the appellant (defendant). Mary Lesser, deputy assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were John M. Bailey, state’s attorney, and Warren Maxwell, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

There is no error.
